articles.title: The Galaxy Z Flip 5 might finally bring some long-awaited display upgrades in 2023 - PhoneArena
articles.description: Latest leak regarding the Galaxy Z Flip 5 points to likely its biggest upgrade that we know about so far!
articles.content: We have plenty of time until Samsung releases its next foldable phones, which if the company stays true to its schedule so far, are expected to arrive sometime between August and September of 2023.Ev… [+1963 chars]

articles.author: Tom West
articles.title: Microsoft held Activision talks with Sony over the weekend — report - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Microsoft reportedly met with Sony last weekend to discuss Activision's catalogue of games and their continued support on PlayStation consoles, amid the ongoing investigations into Microsoft's $69 billion deal.
articles.content: Seeing so many players unlocking Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II achievements makes it clear why the series continues to be the central focus of the dispute between Microsoft and Sony. It's been the … [+1301 chars]
